name: EveryAction
description: You work for an organization that sends emails to its supporters using NGP 7. Youâ€™ve been asked to produce a repeatable report of emails sent through the system. Using the language and framework of your choice, write a script or program that calls the /v2/BroadcastEmails endpoint, retrieves the full list of emails sent, and prints the EmailMessageId and Name. After outputting the list of emails, your program should also print the total number of emails sent.
